targets.query: SELECT last(value) FROM "cluster_status" WHERE "cluster_name" = 'cinder' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last(value) FROM "cluster_status" WHERE "cluster_name" = 'keystone' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last(value) FROM "cluster_status" WHERE "cluster_name" = 'glance' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last(value) FROM "cluster_status" WHERE "cluster_name" = 'heat' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last(value) FROM "cluster_status" WHERE "cluster_name" = 'neutron' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last(value) FROM "cluster_status" WHERE "cluster_name" = 'nova' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last(value) FROM "cluster_status" WHERE "cluster_name" = 'rabbitmq' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last(value) FROM "cluster_status" WHERE "cluster_name" = 'mysql' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last(value) FROM "cluster_status" WHERE "cluster_name" = 'apache' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last(value) FROM "cluster_status" WHERE "cluster_name" = 'haproxy' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last(value) FROM "cluster_status" WHERE "cluster_name" = 'memcached' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT min(value) FROM "openstack_nova_total_free_vcpus" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT max(value) FROM "openstack_nova_total_used_vcpus" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "openstack_nova_total_free_ram" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "openstack_nova_total_used_ram" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT min(value) FROM "openstack_nova_total_free_disk" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "openstack_nova_total_used_disk" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "cpu_user" WHERE "hostname" = '$controller' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "cpu_idle" WHERE "hostname" = '$controller' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "cpu_interrupt" WHERE "hostname" = '$controller' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "cpu_nice" WHERE "hostname" = '$controller' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "cpu_system" WHERE "hostname" = '$controller' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "cpu_steal" WHERE "hostname" = '$controller' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "cpu_wait" WHERE "hostname" = '$controller' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "memory_used" WHERE "hostname" = '$controller' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "memory_buffered" WHERE "hostname" = '$controller' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "memory_cached" WHERE "hostname" = '$controller' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "memory_free" WHERE "hostname" = '$controller' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)

targets.series: select last(100.0*avail.value/(used.value + free.value)) from "$server.fs.$mount.space.free" as free inner join "$server.fs.$mount.space.used" as used where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
targets.query: SELECT last(value) FROM "fs_space_percent_free" WHERE "hostname" = '$controller' AND "fs" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last(value) FROM "ceph_health" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "ceph_pool_total_percent_free" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last(value) FROM "ceph_objects_count" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last(value) FROM "ceph_osd_count_up" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last(value) FROM "ceph_osd_count_down" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

list.name: controller
list.query: show tag values from pacemaker_local_resource_active with key = hostname
